# NFCReaderError.Code.ndefReaderSessionErrorTagUpdateFailure

**Case**

The reader session failed to update the NDEF tag.

## Declaration

```swift
case ndefReaderSessionErrorTagUpdateFailure
```

## NDEF Tag Errors

- **NFCReaderError.Code.ndefReaderSessionErrorTagNotWritable**: The NDEF tag isn’t writable.
- **NFCReaderError.Code.ndefReaderSessionErrorTagSizeTooSmall**: The NDEF tag memory size is too small to store the data.
- **NFCReaderError.Code.ndefReaderSessionErrorZeroLengthMessage**: The NDEF tag doesn’t contain an NDEF message.
- **NFCReaderError.Code.ndefReaderSessionErrorTagNotWritable**: The NDEF tag isn’t writable.
- **NFCReaderError.Code.ndefReaderSessionErrorTagSizeTooSmall**: The NDEF tag memory size is too small to store the data.
- **NFCReaderError.Code.ndefReaderSessionErrorZeroLengthMessage**: The NDEF tag doesn’t contain an NDEF message.
